column2: You helped the Followers of Ascension.
Unlock the Exotic tier of this item to purchase this.
A magical construct formed by fusing the unbound energy of the Forgotten with the very stones and sand of the Crystal Desert.
Engage and cull the Forged army.
Kaidenna's wyld hunt is to uncover the secrets of Ascension. She can be located either by the contract board or by heading to Augury Rock.

Juvenile Elonian raptors rely more on cuteness than leaping ability.
Combine a Red, Blue, and Yellow Raptor with 8 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Black Raptor.
Combine a Red, Yellow, and Black Raptor with 12 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Gold Raptor.
The Artist's Mirror: How Art Reflects Society: Found on the ground floor.

Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

<c=@flavor>Normal choya are vicious, but give these guys an extra three feet of height and reach, and they become unstoppable." —Pit Master Oberon</c>"
Unlock the Exotic tier of this item to purchase this.

Volatile Magic Collector
• Trades Goods for Volatile Magic
Scourge's Threshold marks the start of the Scourgeway south, connecting to Joko's Bone Palace and eventually Vabbi.
Unlock the skin for the rare tier of this item to purchase the upgrade recipe.

Collect this and return it to the Sanctuary.

Collecting this will also provide bonus desert Mastery experience.
A recipe to make ascended light leggings with Marshal's (+Power, +Healing, +Condition Damage, and +Precision) stats.
Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.
